name: Space Commander 9
description:
Space Commander 9 is a modern 3D space shooter game that puts you in the seat of a space ship with orders to defend the human race against the alien invasion.
Build and manage your space arsenal, and defend your world.

Main Features:
• Space Shipyard - Where Player can unlock new spaceships.
• Weapon Station - Where Player can upgrade ship system, purchase and mount new weapons and create his own preferable Spaceship design.
• Commander Perks - where player can train his commander.
• Earn credits to purchase, research to unlock & upgrade new ships and ship modules, allowing you to better defend your ship and your planet.
